input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: My decision has a direct effect on penguin mood and foot size. Penguin mood has a direct effect on foot size. Method 1: We look at how my decision correlates with foot size case by case according to penguin mood. Method 2: We look directly at how my decision correlates with foot size in general. To understand how my decision affects foot size, is it more correct to use the Method 1 than Method 2?
